title: run a website audit successfully
description: Test the /run-audit POST endpoint to verify that a website audit can be initiated successfully with valid url and auditId. Validate the response status 200 and success flag.

title: handle audit failure gracefully
description: Test the /run-audit POST endpoint with scenarios causing audit failure (e.g., invalid url, external API failure) and verify the response status 500 with appropriate error message.

title: create stripe checkout session successfully
description: Test the /create-checkout POST endpoint to verify that a Stripe checkout session is created successfully when a valid price_id is provided. Validate the response status 200 and presence of checkout url.
